name: Vampire Blues
description: Bourbon and sherry make for a savory, spicy fall cocktail from Jessica Gonzalez of Death & Co. in New York.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce Lustau East India Solera Sherry
1 teaspoon pumpkin butter such as American Spoon Fruit or Stonewall Kitchen

recipeInstructions.text: Add bourbon, sherry, lemon juice, simple syrup, pumpkin butter, and bitters to a cocktail shaker. Fill with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with cinnamon stick.
